name: Happy Jewel
description:
Happy Jewel is one of the most fun casual puzzle games.
It has all features of great puzzle block game.
It helps to exercise your brain and improve your thinking.

Game Feature:
- Simply drag the blocks to move them
- Try to create full lines on the grid vertically or horizontally.
- Game over if no room for extra blocks.
- The higher the score, the more rewards

Tips: Think twice to put the jewel in the appropriate position;

Why choose it?
- Gorgeous scene and Comfortable music
- Excellent game operation experience
- Free for all ages without time limit

Come and try to get the highest score Now!
